title: Baked Parmesan rosemary salmon
ingredients: ['4 (120g) salmon fillets', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '45g butter', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary', '1 clove garlic, minced', '4 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
